item.title: What Is My Speed?
item.description: img { display: block; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto } “What Is My Speed?” is available now from the iTunes App Store for iPhone and Apple Watch. If you read my recent blog post on Road Trip Apps you will have realised that I was working on an app to fill a gap that I discovered in our road trip app arsenal. So here it is: “What Is My Speed?
